definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: At 2 pm, Miss Fan of children's wear store in their own sit.
sentences.chinese: 下午2时许，范女士在自己的童装店里闲坐。

sentences.english: Out with a small chair, I seated myself leisurely under the tung flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我搬过一个小椅子，在桐花下闲坐。

sentences.english: She can't sit around and do nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她总不能闲坐着无所事事呀。

sentences.english: People usually walk in the street or sit in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 人们经常到街上散步或者在露天的地方闲坐。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen someone just sitting around, doing nothing?
sentences.chinese: 你可见过一个闲坐着什么也不干的人？

sentences.english: I am not allowed to sit like a dandelion on my own stem.
sentences.chinese: 我不被允许像一只独居枝头的薄公英那样闲坐。

sentences.english: There were several young people sitting around looking bored.
sentences.chinese: 有几个年青人闲坐着，一副无聊的样子。

sentences.english: The patient is picturing a guy in sweatpants sitting around the house drinking beer.
sentences.chinese: 病人描绘出了一个穿着短裤闲坐在屋里喝啤酒的人。

sentences.english: Don't sit around and do nothing for years.
sentences.chinese: 不要多年就闲坐着而不做任何事情。

sentences.english: I would like reading instead of sitting without anything to do.
sentences.chinese: 我中意读书而不愿意闲坐着。

sentences.english: Static view from the clouds and cloud-to sit bow to Fisherman.
sentences.chinese: 静看云起云又落，闲坐船头作渔翁。

sentences.english: Sitting around as he did, the weeks seemed to pass very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他这样闲坐在家，一星期又一星期好像过得非常快。

sentences.english: I like reading instead of sitting without anything to do.
sentences.chinese: 我中意读书而不愿意闲坐着。

definition: variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
to cool off in the shade
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
to sit quietly/to meditate/to stage a sit-in
